DOC.brief_summary: The investigators plan to perform a randomized, mutual-control and double-blinded cohort study to further exploit the vitamin A supplementation on iron metabolic homeostasis (including iron reserve, mobilization and absorption status in the same population) compared with solely iron and vitamin A plus iron.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Vitamin A Supplementation on Iron Metabolic Homeostasis of Preschool Children in Sichuan,China
DOC.criteria: apparent health; Hb concentration>60 g/L; Creaction protein (CRP)<10 mg/L; parental or guardian approval of participation in all aspects of the study; and parental/guardian agreement to avoid the additional use of vitamin and mineral supplements during the investigation. does not match the inclusion criteria
